title: Immersive Virtual Reality (IVR)-Based Plant Learning Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Plant Structures and Growth Processes
context.additional_context: Pedagogical competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Learning plant structure observation and growth process simulation via Immersive VR (IVR) technology

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify and describe the 3D structures of roots, stems, and leaves in an immersive virtual reality (IVR) environment.
Learners can simulate plant physiological processes such as photosynthesis and transpiration through virtual experiments and record results.
Learners can analyze growth-stage-specific characteristics of a particular plant and submit findings as a digital portfolio through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
